ValidationRule.description: Prevents anyone except system admin, zone assistant or Operations Delegated Administrators from changing titles (this is for CCR/ASR customized convert button).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HRS Regional Sales Admin")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"Core Zone Administration")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HNBF Sales Administration")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"MMS Sales ZSA")), $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration", $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 MMS Hub Manager - DA", $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Safety Delegated Admin", $Profile.Name <>"2008-09 HRS Premier Support - DA", $Profile.Name <>"Field Ops Regional Assistant", $Profile.Name <>"PIA Agency Delegated Admin", $Profile.Name <>"HRS PEO Centric Administration", $Profile.Name <>"MPSC Profile", $Profile.Name <>"HR Essentials", $Profile.Name <>"Sales Data Steward", $Profile.Name <>"Sales Enablement" ,$Profile.Name <> "BeneTrac Operations"), ISCHANGED( Title ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ** This field can only be changed by the System Administrator, Zone Assistants or Operations Delegated Administrators **
